other_title: Japan Air Self Defence Force Tactical Training Squadron 801 T.T.S. Airbats
plot: When aviation mechanic (and anime fanboy) Takuya Isurugi is transferred to the 801st Tactical Training Squadron, he gets more than he bargained for. Moderated by hard-headed veteran ace Mitsuru Konishi, the "Airbats" are an all-female aerial acrobatic team consisting of loose cannons Miyuki Haneda and Arisa Mitaka, karaoke freak and gambling genius Sakura Saginomiya, and junk food lover Yoko Shimorenjaku. Both Haneda and Mitaka do not get along with each other, and their rivalry worsens when they both fall for Isurugi. But with the entire JASDF having doubts about the team, the Airbats must work as a team or face total disbandment.
opening_theme: "Niji ni Naritai" (虹になりたい; "I Wanna Be a Rainbow") by Mayaka
ending_theme: "Taiyō ga Atatameta Kimochi" (太陽があたためた気持ち; "The Sun Warms My Heart") by Aya Hisakawa and Ai Orikasa (eps 1-3)
"Fuchū Shigure" (府中しぐれ; "A Light Rain in Fuchū") by Kikuko Inoue (ep 4)
"Aozora no Love Letter" (青空のラブレター; "Love Letter in the Blue Sky") by Yukana Nogami (eps 5-7)
